concept.title: Gallery
concept.shortdesc: Heart-centered addressing is touched upon in the following photos. Each piece examines how different forms of addresses shape our connection to places and communities. Images were taken with a damaged although affordable mobile phone.

fig.title: Terry Fox
fig.desc: Terry Fox viewed through an orange heart stencil.

fig.title: July is Disability Pride Month
fig.desc: Photograph of Disability Pride flag viewed through an orange heart stencil.

section.p: The following descriptive text was copied from the Ashland Public Library:

lq.p: Green is for sensory disabilities, including deafness and blindness.
Blue represents emotional and psychiatric disabilities, including mental illness, anxiety and depression.
White stands for non-visible and undiagnosed disabilities.

The stripes are displayed on a faded charcoal black background which commemorates and mourns disabled people who've died due to ableism, violence, ableism, violence, negligence, suicide, rebellion, illness and eugenics.

fig.title: Human Rights - Dweb Camp 2022 Notes
fig.desc: Digital rendering of paint/ink of handwritten notes and paint about a human-rights centered design agency assisting with online safety.

image.alt: Orange heart with the words "HUMAN RIGHTS CENTERED DESIGN BASED IN NYC/BERLIN" surrounded by additional notes that say "Public Research Technologies", "looks at threat models. Staff is secure and careful. Goals: provide resources, usable security, open source", "Change who technology serves". An overlay of other notes documents DWeb values of diversity, inclusion, model tech around common good".

section.p: Orange heart outline around handwritten notes about a human rights centered design agency based in NYC/Berline with additional notes on dweb values such as diversity and inclusion. Chat GPT 4o was used to flatten the image backgrond.

fig.title: Elephantish
fig.desc: Close up photograph of Elephant Rocks, a naturally formed geological landmark on the road to Dillon Beach, viewed through an orange heart stencil. Rock indentations form the elephant's eyes, and the top of its trunk and limbs. The rock formation is viewed through a blurry orange stencil.

image.alt: Natural gray rock formations which resembles elephants looking down framed by an orange heart stencil. Rock indentations on what looks like the torso resemble the top of the elephant's limbs.

section.p: Marin County landmark used to help provide directions to the beach. Downhill from the rocks, a highway sign informs drivers that the GPS directions to the beach and campgrounds are incorrect.

fig.title: Daisy Flowers
fig.desc: Photograph of white and yellow daisies, viewed through an orange heart stencil.

image.alt: White and yellow daisies growing in the ground with green foliage framed by an orange heart stencil.

section.p: Salt Spring Island, British Columbia, Canada

section.title: DWeb Camp Notes 2022
section.p: Digitized rendering of handwritten notes and stencilled paper while looking for cybersecurity resources for women's reproductive health. Digitally altered by prompting Chat GPT to "flatten background".
